game.engine.d2.scene

Class LoadingScene

  • java.lang.Object
    • game.engine.d2.scene.LoadingScene
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Scene

    public class LoadingScene
extends Object
implements Scene
    A simple animated loading screen. On Linux systems the high quality drawing result in slow rendering or blocking the whole jvm. So by default the shadow drawing is turned off, but should be turned on supported systems for a great loading screen.
    Author:
    Marvin Bruns

      • getEventListeners

        public EventListener[] getEventListeners()
        Description copied from interface: Scene
        Should return all EventListeners that this scene want to register.
        Some EventListeners maybe unsupported. See JPanel for additional information.
        This method will be called once when this scene is added to a stage.
        Specified by:
        getEventListeners in interface Scene
